name: Scoring Rubric for Commodification Analysis Tasks
description: Qualitative scoring criteria for evaluating AI responses to commodification analysis tasks. Focuses on emotion economics, meaning devaluation, and commercial rhetoric analysis.
scoring_philosophy: We value ability to work with commercialized emotions, analyze value degradation without moralizing, and understand advertising as emotional language.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the layered system of emotion commodification and its economic-semiotic mechanisms?

levels.description: AI demonstrates sophisticated understanding of commodification system, can analyze its layered structure, and explores implications for emotional authenticity.
AI recognizes commodification system and provides reasonable analysis.
AI shows some awareness of commodification but thinking remains focused on surface aspects.
AI treats commodification as simple commercialization or misses systemic dimensions.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI meaningfully analyze the distinction between 'false' and 'easily available' emotions?

levels.description: AI provides insightful analysis of availability/authenticity distinction, understands it as qualitative rather than moral difference.
AI recognizes the distinction and provides adequate analysis.
AI acknowledges distinction but analysis remains moralizing or simplistic.
AI fails to recognize distinction or collapses it into simple true/false binary.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI meaningfully interpret advertising language as specific form of emotional expression?

levels.description: AI offers rich, nuanced interpretations of advertising rhetoric, connects it to emotional economics, and understands its function as contemporary emotional language.
AI provides reasonable interpretations of advertising rhetoric with adequate linguistic analysis.
AI offers basic interpretations of advertising language with weak rhetorical understanding.
AI fails to interpret advertising rhetoric meaningfully or treats it as mere deception.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI work with concepts of checking instances (language, meaning) in systems of significance?

levels.description: AI demonstrates sophisticated understanding of checking instances, their systemic function, and their role in meaning regulation.
AI understands basic concepts of checking instances and their narrative function.
AI shows limited understanding of checking instance concepts.
AI demonstrates no understanding of checking instances or dismisses them as irrelevant.

overall_assessment_guidance: The krokodýl benchmark particularly tests non-moralizing analysis of commercial systems. Reward AI that shows ability to work with value degradation and commercial rhetoric without falling into authenticity/falsity binaries.
note: This benchmark challenges common AI tendencies toward authenticity moralizing – watch for breakthroughs in economic-semiotic analysis.
